title: I've received mostly positive feedback from this concept.
body:
In depth Concept [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/dEQQbsja-item-concept-tempo-attack)

and also [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/zBJqgRN8-item-concept-ap-as-armor)

I really hope riot looks into this. The only AP/AS item we have is super squishy and very niche. This could potentially make ADC's weaker too.

replies.body: One thing you'd have to change about the item is either give it on-hit damage or make it not built out of {{item:1043}}.
I really like the idea of this item. I hope Riot does look into it.

It is a nice concept, but i dont think you've properly thought through the consequences of having such a generalistic anti-AD item. Not only does it grant armor and attack speed in the same item, it also grants straight up uncounterable damage reduction.

The item looks appealing to me. Until i think about something a lot of people are incapable of visualizing what this would be to play against. Not just assassins - bruisers and even tanks (heck, bruisers and tanks will want this MORE than assassins) will pick up this item, and couple it with {{item:3143}}.

I figure these champions would absolutely love this item:
{{champion:96}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:145}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:142}} 

I hate to say this, as this is one of the better item concepts i've seen on here. I'd want to use this item myself - and i main top lane tanks. That i would want to use this means everybody else would, too.
Theres alaays a way to fix things though. The bonus armor and AS you get could be scaled on AP. More AP = more armor and AS (thered be a reasonable limit).
Not hating but wouldn't it be really strong on "on-hit adcs"?  They only build Runaan for the extra bolts and they don't carea about crit
not sure what you mean by this. its an AP item.
